author: bencomic

right.text: I pry apart that battleship you call your ass. I see poo nuggets hanging from the hair around your ass. They stink really bad.

left.text: Mmmm I grab your swelling buttocks in my hands. You begin to sway back and forth. I turn you around to lick your asshole.

right.text: I Kick you from the Channel

left.text: 'I start to get fed up with your ugly ass. I tear off your wooden peg leg. I ram it up your ass. Then I pour hot caramel over your head. And turn you into a fucking candy apple…

title: the saga of chairface chippendale, part 2
